SELECT j.user_id, j.job_post_no, jp.title, jp.end_date , c.company_id, c.company_name, j.scrap_date FROM tbl_jpl j inner JOIN tbl_job_post jp ON j.job_post_no = jp.job_post_no INNER JOIN tbl_company c ON jp.company_id = c.company_id WHERE user_id= #{userId} ORDER BY j.scrap_date DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT p.title, p.DATE, u.user_name, p.proposal_no, p.read_date from tbl_proposal p JOIN tbl_user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id WHERE company_id = #{companyId} ORDER BY proposal_no DESC LIMIT 3;

SELECT A.job_post_no, A.company_id, company.company_name, company.company_address, company.company_address_detail, company.company_birth, company.company_image, company.company_email, company.company_employee, company.company_info, company.company_website, company.company_zonecode, A.title, A.job_history, A.job_salary, A.content, A.method, A.add_notice, A.manager_name, A.manager_email, A.manager_phone, A.education_code, A.job_rank_code, A.work_code, A.work_type_code, A.process, A.start_date, A.end_date,
${groupCode}.NAME AS ${groupCode}_name
FROM tbl_job_post A LEFT JOIN tbl_company company ON A.company_id = company.company_id
LEFT JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tbl_gubn WHERE group_code = #{groupCode} ) ${groupCode} ON A.${groupCode}_CODE = ${groupCode}.CODE
WHERE A.company_id = #{companyId} LIMIT 3
